```{R,echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(formattable)
library(roperators)


# dt = readRDS(file = "C:/Users/ftw712/Desktop/hotspot_density_table.rda")

dt = readr::read_tsv("C:/Users/ftw712/Desktop/hotspot_density_table.tsv")

dt = dt %>% 
  mutate(occ_density = round(occ_density,2)) %>%
  mutate(occ_density_no_birds = round(occ_density_no_birds,2)) 
  # %>%
  # filter(Type == "hotspot area")

# glimpse(dt)


options(kableExtra.html.bsTable = TRUE)

dt %>%
  mutate(NAME = 
  cell_spec(NAME,
  "html",
  escape=FALSE,
  bold=TRUE,
  link=urls)) %>%
  select(NAME,occ_density, occ_density_no_birds) %>%
  arrange(-occ_density) %>%
  kable(format = "html",escape=FALSE) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed"),fixed_thead = TRUE)




```
